text: Shore Leave () is a 1962 Soviet drama movie directed by Feliks Mironer.Ариадна Всеволодовна Шенгелая. Биографическая справкаУВОЛЬНЕНИЕ НА БЕРЕГ It stars Ariadna Shengelaya, Lev Prygunov, and Vasili Makarov. == Actors == * Ariadna Shengelaya as Zhenya * Lev Prygunov as Nikolai Valezhnikov * Vasili Makarov as Vasily Kuzmich * Svetlana Konovalova as Zinaida Prokofievna * Vladimir Vysotsky as Pyotr * Natalya Kustinskaya as Katya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1962 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Shore Leave (1962 movie)
